results.name: Expansion of 1/(theta_3(q) * theta_3(q^2) * theta_3(q^3)), where theta_3() is the Jacobi theta function.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: (PARI) q='q+O('q^80); Vec(1/prod(k=1,3, eta(q^(2*k))^5/(eta(q^k)* eta(q^(4*k)))^2 )) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 29 2018
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Oct 05 2018
